HediffDef.label: studied ancient ARC
HediffDef.description: This particular colonist has studied the ancient ARC. It allows them to build, upgrade and maintain an ARC in the colony.

HediffDef.label: studied ancient geothermal ARC
HediffDef.description: This particular colonist has studied the ancient geothermal ARC. It allows them to build, upgrade and maintain a geothermal ARC in the colony.

HediffDef.label: studied nuclear ARC husk
HediffDef.description: This particular colonist has studied a nuclear ARC husk. It allows them to build, upgrade and maintain a nuclear ARC in the colony.
Traitorous inventor. This hediff shouldn't be visible to players. If you are seeing this you will go to cheater hell, which is full of politicians.
HediffDef.label: traitorous inventor
